title: The Gig Economy Isn’t What You Think It Is
description: Companies like Uber, Lyft, and Doordash have brought the term "gig economy" into our lexicon. But what is the gig economy really? When you start digging into the data, you find it's a lot harder to define than you think. On this episode, Kate and Luigi investigate the pros, cons and myths of the gig economy.
author: uchicagopodcasts@gmail.com (University of Chicago Podcast Network)
